com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api.event

Class PTalkEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • com.pyramidacceptors.ptalk.api.event.PTalkEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptingEvent, BillJammedEvent, CashboxFullEvent, CasseteMissingEvent, CheatedEvent, CreditEvent, EscrowedEvent, FailureEvent, IdlingEvent, InvalidMessageEvent, PowerUpEvent, RejectedEvent, ReturnedEvent, ReturningEvent, StackedEvent, StackingEvent

    public class PTalkEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    Consumers subscribe to these events for all device notifications.
    Extend this class to create your events.
    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Cory Todd
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Base event for all PTalk events that a slave can raise
        Parameters:
        source - origin the event
        billName - the name of the bill credited or invalid if non-credit event
        friendylyString - parsed command code or additional information
        e - Events type
